title: Tuesday Post Show (05-24-22)
itunes:title: Tuesday Post Show (05-24-22)
description:
Bobby starts with the Top 3 songs in country music. A man who was busted stealing an expensive car from a valet. A Wisconsin couple had to take out a bear who busted into their home and attacked them. Bobby shares he’s been dealing with foxes at his house. Someone on the show won money in the lottery. Bobby reveals why he has been trolling people online. Bobby thinks Eddie’s Reels are getting out of hand.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
